name: The Last Pikeman
description:
As the eponymous hero, the player is tasked with fighting against the forces of a heavily-armed militia in a world beset by firearms, using only their trusty pike as their guide. I created this back in 2008 and then retooled it a couple of years later to address some long-standing bugs. This version also includes the Game Maker source code in the old .gmk format.

You can view additional resources, including a link to a video walkthrough, by visiting http://www.michaelseaholm.com/game_development
